Articles.Content:
This post is just to say that i am using the items of the Heat management mod from Randazzo with 1.1.2.

The topic has been closed, but the items I used, AHMS, deployable cooling systems, works very well with the Nuclear light bulb from the Atomic Age mod by Porkjet.

For those who are looking for cooling system, even with no update, it works well maybe be because it's only parts, there no plugin and the animation for deployable cooling system is OK
Thread about add-ons moved to Add-on Discussion.
